com.nttdocomo.ui
Class Ticker

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.nttdocomo.ui.Component
        |
        +--com.nttdocomo.ui.Ticker
public final class Ticker
extends Component

This defines the components of ticker tape display (markie). Ticker class is one of the UI components used in high level API. Character strings flow leftward. The speed of the character strings flow is implementation dependent. When the size of ticker tape component is designated, the following is true.
When the component height is less than the height of the character string, set the center of the character height as the center. The excess parts at the top and bottom shall be cut off and not shown.
When ticker component size is not designated, the height is automatically high enough to display the designated character string and the width is the same as the screen width.

Constructor Summary
Ticker()
          The displayed character string creates the ticker of an empty character string (" ").
Ticker(java.lang.String text)
          This creates a ticker by designating the displayed character string.

Constructor Detail

Ticker

public Ticker()
The displayed character string creates the ticker of an empty character string (" "). When created, it is visible. To set visible or invisible, the setVisible method is used.

Ticker

public Ticker(java.lang.String text)
This creates a ticker by designating the displayed character string. When created, it is visible. To set visible or invisible, the setVisible method is used.

Parameters:
text - Designates the displayed character string. When null is designated, an empty character string (" ") is set.
Method Detail

setText

public void setText(java.lang.String text)
This designates the character string to be displayed.

Parameters:
text - Designates the displayed character string. When null is designated, an empty character string (" ") is set.
